channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Green commercial rack on bagshott street, 24th February
item.description:
A large commercial metal shelving unit has been flytipped on a planting patch on Bagshot street across from the commercial units today. The shelves had been previously chained for the last few months/years to the shop Graces Palace as shown in an earlier image from as recently as 11 Feb.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Bagshot Street, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken pavement, 24th February
item.description:
Broken paving slabs all along Walton Road, making the walk to school dangerous. Children are regularly tripping and hurting themselves.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 113, Walton Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Percy Road, Greater London

item.title: Pothole, 24th February
item.description:
This pothole has been here for ages and has now damaged my vehicle. Please get it fixed

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Braddyll Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree seriously damaged by lorry, 24th February
item.description:
A lorry carrying scaffolding virtually destroyed this 20-year old tree that has been cared by the local community since it was planted by Hackney. The company should respond for this. They installed scaffolding outside 47 Prince George Road.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Prince George Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Long, deep pothole beside the bus stop nr shops in Southwood Road., 24th February
item.description:
I’m sure you are already aware of the appalling road condition by the bus stop. Passengers often have to alight away from a safe kerb as cars are always parked both ends. It’s unbelievable that you have allowed this to go on for so long, an accident waiting to happen.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwood Road, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light is flickering on Whitehorse Hill (Greenwich side), 24th February
item.description:
There is a faulty street light that has been flickering for over a week directly opposite our house. The strobe effect is a nuisance and shines directly into one the bedrooms. The street light is on the Greenwich side of Whitehorse Hill and close to Hathern Gardens.The street light number is 74W24.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): White Horse Hill, Chislehurst
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 24th February
item.description:

item.title: Area around manhole cover wearing away creating trip hazard, 24th February
item.description:
